description: Admission to various B.Tech courses at Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad is done based on JEE Mains All India Rank. Let's take a look at the previous cut-offs for various engineering branches. The below-mentioned ranks are All India Ranks and Home State Students.

basic_info.name: KEC Ghaziabad Placements
description: Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad offers great career-building opportunities for students. Almost 80% of the students were placed in the placement drive of 2022 and the highest package offered to the students was INR 12.5 LPA while the average package was INR 3.5 LPA.

faqs.question: Ques.What is the placement scenario at KEC Ghaziabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.In the placement drive of 2022, a total of 517 students were placed from Krishna Engineering College. The highest package offered was 12.5 LPA, and the average package was 3.5 LPA. Additionally, the overall placement percentage over the years at KEC Ghaziabad is 80%

faqs.question: Ques.How are the admissions conducted for KEC Ghaziabad in 2023?
faqs.answer: Ans.The admission procedure for Krishna Engineering College in 2023 includes appearing for the respective entrance exams (JEE Mains for B.Tech and CUET-PG for MCA), applying for UPTAC Counseling, and document verification at the KEC Ghaziabad campus.

faqs.question: Ques.Is KEC Ghaziabad affiliated with any university?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna Engineering College is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. Additionally, the college is also approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).

faqs.question: Ques.What courses are offered at Krishna Engineering College?
faqs.answer: Ans.Krishna Engineering College offers 5 undergraduate (B.Tech and B.E) and 1 postgraduate (MCA) course in full-time mode. Students can opt for various specializations in these courses such as computer science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning.

faqs.question: Ques.What are the eligibility criteria for B.Tech admission at KEC Ghaziabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.The eligibility criteria for B.Tech admission at KEC Ghaziabad is a minimum of 50% in 10+2, and the selection criteria are based on the JEE Mains all-India rank.

faqs.question: Ques.What are the facilities available at Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.The facilities available at Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad include an auditorium, boys' and girls' hostels, a cafeteria, a gym, medical facilities, labs, a library, transportation services, a sports complex, and a Wi-Fi campus.

faqs.question: Ques.What are the eligibility criteria for MCA admission at KEC Ghaziabad?
faqs.answer: Ans.For MCA admission at Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad, the eligibility criteria is a minimum of 50% in graduation, and the selection criteria are based on the CUET-PG scores.

Section.name: About KEC
Section.description:
Krishna Engineering College or KEC is a leading technical education college in Ghaziabad, Uttar Pradesh. The college is approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE) and is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. Krishna Engineering College was founded in 2004 and offers 5 UG courses and 1 PG course in full-time mode.
KEC Ghaziabad offers courses in fields like engineering, IT, and Software. The top courses offered in the KEC Ghaziabad include B.Tech with various specializations, B.E, and MCA. The admission to the various engineering courses in KEC Ghaziabad is done based on the JEE Mains rank through UPTAC Counseling conducted by Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. CUET-PG scores are considered for admission to the MCA course.
Check KEC Ghaziabad admission 2023
In addition to the various world-class facilities, Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad has tremendous placement opportunities for students. In the placement drive of 2022, a total of 517 students were placed. The highest package offered to KEC Ghaziabad students was 12.5 LPA while the average package was 3.5 LPA. The top companies visiting the campus included Amazon, TCS, Wipro, and Mestudds.

Ques.What is the placement scenario at KEC Ghaziabad?
Ans.In the placement drive of 2022, a total of 517 students were placed from Krishna Engineering College. The highest package offered was 12.5 LPA, and the average package was 3.5 LPA. Additionally, the overall placement percentage over the years at KEC Ghaziabad is 80%
Ques.How are the admissions conducted for KEC Ghaziabad in 2023?
Ans.The admission procedure for Krishna Engineering College in 2023 includes appearing for the respective entrance exams (JEE Mains for B.Tech and CUET-PG for MCA), applying for UPTAC Counseling, and document verification at the KEC Ghaziabad campus.
Ques.Is KEC Ghaziabad affiliated with any university?
Ans.Krishna Engineering College is affiliated with Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technical University, Lucknow. Additionally, the college is also approved by the All India Council of Technical Education (AICTE).
Ques.What courses are offered at Krishna Engineering College?
Ans.Krishna Engineering College offers 5 undergraduate (B.Tech and B.E) and 1 postgraduate (MCA) course in full-time mode. Students can opt for various specializations in these courses such as computer science, artificial intelligence, and machine learning.
Ques.What are the eligibility criteria for B.Tech admission at KEC Ghaziabad?
Ans.The eligibility criteria for B.Tech admission at KEC Ghaziabad is a minimum of 50% in 10+2, and the selection criteria are based on the JEE Mains all-India rank.

Ans.The facilities available at Krishna Engineering College, Ghaziabad include an auditorium, boys' and girls' hostels, a cafeteria, a gym, medical facilities, labs, a library, transportation services, a sports complex, and a Wi-Fi campus.
